message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate it.  I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $100?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $110 is a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about I sell it to you for $105?
